title: Ever Since I Take Home An Adonis Who Has Lost His Business - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Businessmen   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Kind Love Interests   Love at First Sight   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Short Story   Tragic Past   Unconditional Love
author: Shao Nu Jiang   少女醬
description:
I picked up an Adonis whom I had a crush on for three years after he lost his business.

I cooked for him, acted silly to make him smile, and ran all over the places to help him make business connections.

On the day he makes his comeback, I intend to go to the temple to become a monk.>
